prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Synth Pad, Brass, Drums, Guitar, Organ, Piano, but without Pipe.
captions:
Style 1:
This song features a combination of Synth Pad, Brass, Drums, Guitar, Organ, and Piano, but without Pipe.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Synth Pad, Brass, Drums, Guitar, Organ, and Piano, omitting Pipe.

Style 3:
This piece is made up of Synth Pad, Brass, Drums, Guitar, Organ, Piano, yet Pipe is absent.
